title: Reality
body: Many of us have had scenarios where we want to be something big but then we limit our mind and our thinking because of a certain REALITY, i have to admit it is a difficult thing to bear cause it messes with your mind and gives you reason to believe it's impossible but that's just life you need to be able to get up again and FIGHT FOR WHAT YOU WANT
author: Eren Jeager

title: Freedom
body: What is indeed freedom ?, is it being able to do anything you want and maybe get away with it.NO as far as i'm concerned i say freedom is the having inner peace within yourself ðŸ˜ƒ,
author: Gon Gintama
